=Create Activity(F)=

Link:


* POST with params: 
  * partner_id,
title,
description,
action_id,
action_content,

Response in json file.
if created successful:
{{{
{
  "code": 1,
  "message": "Success",
}
}}}
or error:
{{{
{
  "code": 0,
  "message": "Fail",
}
}}}

Link:

At this time, we will just create one quiz at a time.

Success:
